title: Skin Pack Manifest
description: The manifest.json file for a Minecraft Bedrock Edition skin pack. Skin packs contain custom player skins that can be applied in-game. The manifest identifies the pack and its contents.

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of this manifest file. Use 1 or 2.

fields.title: Header
fields.description: The header section containing the pack's identity: name, description, unique UUID, and version.

fields.title: Modules
fields.description: Declares modules within the pack. For skin packs, use type 'skin_pack'.

fields.title: Metadata
fields.description: Optional metadata about the pack including author names and license.
